title: In the stacks of  'shadow libraries,' where academics worldwide share articles for free
subhead: 'Click to Pirate' (2/5). Websites that illegally offer scientific articles have become hugely popular within the academic community. Fast and efficient, they represent the utopian ideal of knowledge accessible to all.
